description: {"blocks":[{"key":"8filk","text":"We adapted a previously-described method (Boecker et al., 2020, 2021; Fernandopulle et al., 2018) for differentiating iPSCs stably expressing mNGN2 at a safe-harbor locus into human excitatory glutamatergic neurons. Pre-i 3Neuron iPSCs (human iPSCs with an integrated doxycycline-inducible mNGN2 transgene in the AAVS1 safe-harbor locus) were a gift from M. Ward (National Institutes of Health, Maryland).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

related_materials.name: Fetal bovine serum for cell culture (tetracycline-free)

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"d4h8d","text":"Culture pre-iNeuron iPSCs in a 10 cm dish coated with Growth Factor Reduced Matrigel in Essential 8 media, fed daily. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"864rn","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3qdvt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9n8o0","text":"Pre-iNeuron iPSCs should either have doxycycline-inducible NGN2 present in the safe-harbor AAVS1 locus (“i3Neurons”) or should stably express doxycycline-inducible NGN2 following piggybac transfection (see protocol: “Piggybac-mediated stable expression of NGN2 in iPSCs for differentiation into excitatory glutamatergic neurons”). Before performing differentiation, iPSCs should be tested for mycoplasma, and cytogenetic analysis of G-banded metaphase cells should be performed to confirm a normal karyotype.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"flj23","text":"After  , replace all media with fresh Induction Media, containing   doxycycline but no ROCK inhibitor. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":6,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":66,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6m4ie","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":86400,"guid":"753846504A1E11EDAE9B3D1A73FFD1FE","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"2","error_concentration":false,"guid":"629994E04A1E11EDAE9B3D1A73FFD1FE","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1811}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7momo","text":"Replace again with the same media after   (  after plating).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":40,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":43,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7ref3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":86400,"guid":"5CFCA9504A1E11EDAE9B3D1A73FFD1FE","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":172800,"guid":"5F4A1BC04A1E11EDAE9B3D1A73FFD1FE","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f6ka3","text":"72 hours after plating, dissociate cells with warm Accutase. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ad94v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8rfiu","text":"Count cells in freezing media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4c8e1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1qil0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"rdnt","text":" Freezing media","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2n76l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9gg7p","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"81bt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["162",100],"data":[["BrainPhys","70%"],["FBS","20%"],["DMSO","10%"],["BDNF","10 ng/mL"],["NT-3","10 ng/mL"],["B-27 supplement","1x "]],"guid":"885353B04A1E11EDAE9B3D1A73FFD1FE","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["BrainPhys","70%"],["FBS","20%"],["DMSO","10%"],["BDNF","10 ng/mL"],["NT-3","10 ng/mL"],["B-27 supplement","1x "]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"djvhf","text":"Freeze down cells in a Mr. Frosty container placed in a   freezer  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":56,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":66,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4nkn0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"4B580F504A1E11EDAE9B3D1A73FFD1FE","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"guid":"4F6A63404A1E11EDAE9B3D1A73FFD1FE","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"18fl4","text":"On the following day, transfer cryopreserved neurons to liquid nitrogen storage.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2faq0","text":"Passage iPSCs using warm Accutase and plate 5.5 x 106 cells onto a Matrigelcoated 15 cm dish, in Induction Media (DMEM/F12 supplemented with 1% N2- supplement [GIBCO], 1% NEAA [GIBCO], and 1% GlutaMAX [GIBCO], and containing   doxycycline and   ROCK inhibitor).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":52,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":225,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":243,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4p3so","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1ptug","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"2","error_concentration":false,"guid":"F73C01E04A1F11EDAE9B3D1A73FFD1FE","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1811}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"42FCC4204E5D11EDBCA855E7C020B267","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1622}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":75}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"23bc3","text":"DMEM/F12 supplemented with N2-supplement, NEAA and GlutaMAX can be kept at   for 2-3 months. Doxycycline and ROCK inhibitor should always be added fresh.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"A1F828304A1F11EDAE9B3D1A73FFD1FE","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"temperature"}}}}}}

title: iNeuron differentiation from human iPSCs
